name: National Flag Memorial
description: Iconic monument that pays tribute to the Argentine flag and is a symbolic landmark of the city.

name: El Círculo Theater
description: Historic theater known for its architecture and exceptional acoustics, hosting various artistic performances.

name: Independence Park
description: The largest park in Rosario, ideal for outdoor walks and recreational activities.

name: Juan B. Castagnino Fine Arts Museum
description: Museum housing an outstanding collection of Argentine and European art, located in Independence Park.

name: La Florida Beach
description: Popular beach on the banks of the Paraná River, perfect for enjoying the sun and water activities.

name: Museum of Contemporary Art of Rosario (MACRO)
description: Located in former silos, it showcases contemporary art and offers panoramic views of the city.
location: Bv. Oroño y el Río Paraná, Rosario, Argentina

name: Roberto Fontanarrosa Cultural Center
description: Space dedicated to culture and art, with exhibitions, workshops, and events honoring the graphic humorist.

name: Parque de España
description: Park along the Paraná River, featuring gardens, sculptures, and cultural spaces for events and exhibitions.
